name: Azmar Aviation Training Center (AATC)
about: Azmar Aviation Training Center (AATC) is the first private Iraqi training center authorized by IATA, dedicated to providing cost-effective, high-quality training for the Iraqi aviation industry. Established with the main objective of serving Iraqi aviation customers, AATC offers a wide range of industry courses in aviation management and specialized fields. The center also provides customized courses in aviation, travel, and tourism, enhancing the capabilities of its clients through annual scheduled training programs. With a commitment to delivering added value, AATC stands as a premier training institution in Iraq, ensuring that all its programs meet the highest standards of quality and effectiveness. AATC is your trusted partner for comprehensive aviation training.
